ingredients: 5 tablespoons finely chopped chipotle peppers in adobo sauce
4-1/2 cups canned, diced tomatoes (one 28-ounce can, plus 1 cup)
5 finely chopped scallions (white and green portions)
3 large red, yellow and/or orange bell peppers -- roasted, peeled and thinly sliced (here's How to Roast and Peel a Pepper)
Sea salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste (read here to learn about seasoning to taste)
Sea salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste (read here to learn about seasoning to taste)
